channel.title: 2 Errors Please Help!

item.title: 2 Errors Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

[quote=“laurent 248, post:2, topic:358893”]theres a compiler question topic, use it.[/quote] No-one seems to use, they just add it to here.

if(c.q4 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@red@Vampire Slayer", 7336); } if(c.q4 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@yel@Vampire Slayer", 7336); } if(c.q4 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@whi@Kill Count: "+Killcount+"", 7336); } if(c.q5 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@red@Monkey Madness", 7383); } if(c.q5 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@yel@Monkey Madness", 7383); } if(c.q5 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@whi@Death Count: "+Deathcount+"", 7383); } Try that.

item.title: 2 Errors Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

Hi

I am turning my quest book into a stat book

I have this code

if(c.q4 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@red@Vampire Slayer", 7336); } if(c.q4 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@yel@Vampire Slayer", 7336); } if(c.q4 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@whi@Kill Count: "+killcount+"", 7336); } if(c.q5 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@red@Monkey Madness", 7383); } if(c.q5 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@yel@Monkey Madness", 7383); } if(c.q5 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@whi@Death Count: "+deathcount+"", 7383); }

And i seems to get me this error

textHandler.java:45: cannot find symbol symbol : variable killcount location: class textHandler c.sendQuest("@whi@Kill Count: "+killcount+"", 7336); ^ textHandler.java:54: cannot find symbol symbol : variable deathcount location: class textHandler c.sendQuest("@whi@Death Count: "+deathcount+"", 7383); ^ Note: SYIBlocker.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

I have added this to client.java

public int deathcount = 0;
public int killcount = 0;

I am making this myself so please help

Thanks

Bye

Read full topic
